title: 7.5.5 Create compliance API endpoints and tests
body:
## Parent Issue
#33 - 7.5 Compliance Framework Mapping

## Endpoints
- GET /api/v1/compliance/frameworks
- GET /api/v1/compliance/frameworks/:id/controls
- GET /api/v1/compliance/status/:framework
- GET /api/v1/compliance/findings/:framework

## Files to Create
- `src/cloud_optimizer/api/routers/compliance.py`
- `tests/services/test_compliance.py`
- `tests/compliance/test_loader.py`

## Estimated Time: 2.5 hours
